title: Applications of polymer optical fibre grating sensors to condition monitoring of textiles

references.title: Applications of digital image correlation techniques to experimental mechanics”,
references.raw: Chu T.C., Rason W.F., Sutton M.A. and Peters W.H., “Applications of digital image correlation techniques to experimental mechanics”, Experimental Mechanics, 25,  232-244, 1985

references.title: Assessing the feasibility of monitoring the condition of historic tapestries using engineering techniques”,
references.raw: Dulieu-Barton J.M., Sahin M., Lennard F.J., Eastop D.E. and Chambers A.R. “Assessing the feasibility of monitoring the condition of historic tapestries using engineering techniques”, Key Engineering Materials, 347, pp187-192, 2007

references.title: Condition monitoring of textiles using optical techniques” to be presented in DAMAS’2009
references.raw: Ye C.C., Dulieu-Barton J.M., Chambers A.R., Lennard F.J., Eastop D. D., “Condition monitoring of textiles using optical techniques” to be presented in DAMAS’2009 (Beijing, China, 2009)

references.title: Optical fibre sensors for monitoring damage in historic tapestries”,
references.raw: Dulieu-Barton J.M., Ye C.C., Chambers A.R., Lennard F.J. and Eastop, D.E., “Optical fibre sensors for monitoring damage in historic tapestries”, SEM XI International Congress on Experimental and Applied Mechanics, 2008, Orlando, Florida

references.title: Singlemode polymer optical fiber sensors for high-strain applications”,
references.raw: Webb D.J., Kalli K., Carroll, K., Zhang, C., Komodromos M., Argyros A., Large M., Emiliyanov G., Bang O., Kjaer E., “Singlemode polymer optical fiber sensors for high-strain applications”, Proceedings of SPIE, Advanced Sensor Systems and Applications III, 6830 art. no. 700467, 2007

references.title: Strain and temperature sensitivity of a single-mode polymer optical fiber”,
references.raw: Silva-Lopez M., Fender A., MacPherson W. N., Barton J. S., Jones J. D. C., Zhao, D., Dobb H., Webb D. J., Zhang L., Bennion, I.,. “Strain and temperature sensitivity of a single-mode polymer optical fiber”, Optics Letters  30 (23), pp:3129-3131, 2005

references.title: Strain transferring analysis of fiber Bragg grating sensors”,
references.raw: Li D., Li H., Ren L., Song G. “Strain transferring analysis of fiber Bragg grating sensors”, Optical Engineering, 45(2) 024402-1-

abstract:
Fibre Bragg gratings (FBGs) in polymer optical fibres (POFs) have been used to measure the strain in a woven textile.\ud
FBGs in both POFs and silica optical fibres were attached to a woven textile specimen, and their performance\ud
characterised. It was demonstrated that the POF FBGs provide improved strain transfer coefficients and reduce local\ud
structural reinforcement compared to silica FBGs and therefore make a more suitable proposition for textile monitoring
publisher: SPIE - The International Society for Optical Engineering
